Movie about two Australian girls--Debbie (Nell Schofield) and Sue (Sue Knight)--and what happens when they become girlfriends of two surly bikers--Casey (John Brumpton) and Short Fuse (Stephen Phillips). Taking up with hairpin-bending drivers, these chicks become as reckless and rude as those the men slow down and curse at.
